entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as a powerful wizard who has a part of his soul living inside Harry Potter. He is described as someone who cannot die because of this connection.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the person in whom a part of Lord Voldemort's soul lives, giving him special powers and connections to Voldemort's mind.

entities.name: snakes
entities.description: Snakes are mentioned as creatures with which Harry has a connection due to the part of Voldemort's soul living inside him.

relationships.description: A part of Lord Voldemort's soul lives inside Harry Potter, giving him special powers and connections to Voldemort's mind.
Harry has a connection to Lord Voldemort's mind due to the part of Voldemort's soul living inside him.
